```{r}

source("R/bs_card.R")
source("R/cards_list.r", encoding = "UTF-8")

cards_list <- en_cards

cards_tags <- 
purrr::map(cards_list, function(card){
  bs_card(
  font_color = "white",
  status = "primary",
  title_text =  card$title, 
  body_text = card$text, 
  btn_text = "See more", 
  btn_href = card$href,
  disabled = card$disabled
)
})|> 
  tagList()

card_container <- div(class = "flex-container")
tagAppendChild(card_container, cards_tags)
```
